threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to open out, to expand/bright, glorious
the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site
half of a game or contest/half-court
to be present/to be on the scene

everyone present/the whole audience/across-the-board/unanimously/whole duration (of a competition or match)

sentences.chinese: 相反，猶他最近13場卻輸了10場。

sentences.english: The two dueled, transforming the office of politics into an arena of lightsaber combat.
sentences.chinese: 他們倆展開決鬥，把政府辦公室變成光劍格鬥場。

sentences.english: Fig. 5 depicts the Southern Hemisphere midlatitude 300-hPa geopotential height field.
sentences.chinese: 圖5給出南半球中緯度300百帕位勢高度場。

sentences.english: Invest in a dairy farm and you'll have lots of liquid assets.
sentences.chinese: 投資牛奶場，你會有很多流動資產。

sentences.english: Discover the magical world of Mini Ninjas, and play one of the 3 ninja games.
sentences.chinese: 迷你忍者發現了魔法世界，發揮忍者的3場比賽之一。

sentences.english: Late last year Chengdu's market was suddenly closed down.
sentences.chinese: 去年成都地票交易場突然關閉。

sentences.english: There exists a tight relationship between the geochemical and geophysical steep zones.
sentences.chinese: 地球化學急變帶與地球物理場變化存在密切關係。

sentences.english: Yemen is a testing ground for the “scalpel” approach Mr. Brennan endorses.
sentences.chinese: 也門是布瑞南先生提倡的“手術刀式打擊”的檢驗場。

sentences.english: And Yi did a great job off the bench, after missing 24 games.
sentences.chinese: 在缺席24場比賽後，阿聯打出了一場好球。

sentences.english: A series of extractive lectures have been held by the institute for 10 times.
sentences.chinese: 該學院推出的精品系列講座已舉辦10場。
在組隊生還模式中贏得30場比賽。

sentences.english: Relativistic mean field theory in the rotating frame is used to describe superdeformed nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 用轉動框架中的相對論平均場理論描述超形變核。

sentences.english: Analysis and calculation of the experimental databased on the ligand field theory were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 根據配位場理論對實驗數據作了分析處理。

sentences.english: There we discovered the biggest minefield in the farm- there were cow dung everywhere!
sentences.chinese: 裏頭有五十多頭牛，還有全農場最大的“地雷”場。

sentences.english: E-field distribution are similar on spheres at different radius. (4).
sentences.chinese: 電流陣列在不同半徑場球面上之電場分佈相同。

sentences.english: And at a distance of 2 r naught, I have a positive repulsive term.
sentences.chinese: 在這2r圈的距離上，這裏有一個不可忽略的排斥場。

definition: the scene (of a crime, accident etc)/(on) the spot/(at) the site

to arrive at (place or time)/period/to become due/classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
